EmailTemplate.name: Apache Geode Webinar 9-8-15.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Building Effective Apache Geode Applications with Spring Data GemFire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Building Effective Apache Geode Applications with Spring Data GemFire. We are looking forward to having you join us. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, September 8, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the Session <https://meet57398766.adobeconnect.com/clubhouse/> Thank you,
